Reviews.Content: la P100 es una excelente camara, tiene todos los atributos de una camara profesional antes de serlo pues no permite lente intercambiable ni montar flash. es compacta, liviana, tiene muchas opciones de escenas posibles y adicional si conoces de fotografia es posible ajustarla.LA RECOMIENDO 100% SUS PARES DE OTRAS MARCAS NO OFRECEN EL ZOOM DE 26X O EL VIDEO EN HD, DEFINITIVAMENTE ES LA MAS COMPLETA DE SU GAMA.SALUDOS

Reviews.Title: Coolpix p100
Reviews.Author: P. JOHNSON
Reviews.Content: I had a Coolpix 995 and now this P100. What a great camera! I have never taken such good quality pictures before. Want great pictures? Get it!

Reviews.Title: best deal for the price
Reviews.Author: Chris Alonso
Reviews.Content: Amazing camera, easy to use, does everything a camera costing $1000 would do, compact, lightweight, no changing lenses, it's all there for you...Take great photos.. Thank you NIKON and AMAZON for bringing shopping to a new level

Reviews.Title: Great concept; horrible picture quality
Reviews.Author: LeanneB
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to replace an older Canon S3.  We liked the idea of not carrying around a heavier SLR and getting 26x zoom and HD video.  The Nikon has great ergonomics, is easy to use but the problem is that it takes horrible pictures indoors.  Colors weren't anything close to accurate and sharpness was also a problem.  Outdoor shots looked just OK.  Video quality was good but we didn't want to risk our family memories with consistently poor image quality.  We returned the Nikon P100 and upgraded to the Canon T2i.

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected
Reviews.Author: Sarah
Reviews.Content: I'm a beginner and I bought this camera hoping that it would be an easy one for me to start out with.The manual is quite thick and there are just so many functions.If you have any tricks to capture quality pictures with this camera, let me know.Overall, the pictures are coming out okay. It's a really nice and small camera compared to the rest and i like it.I hope that I would be able to understand and use all its functions soon.

Reviews.Title: I am not happy with pic quality of this camera
Reviews.Author: sumit kumar gupta
Reviews.Content: I was very much exited and waiting for this camera but it was no where near to my expectation. Picture quality was not at all sharp and good as the expected one.I am going to return this and going to get my Nikon s8100 back, that has really better sharpness and natural colour in picture.

Reviews.Title: Can not believe Nikon can make this kind of product
Reviews.Author: Nav
Reviews.Content: This is my first Nikon Camera.  Since last 12 years i am always using canon and olympic camera. This Nikon camera is the worst.  I would say if somebody is giving you for free also, dont take it.  Because you may not find someone to give this camera for free, unless you are ok for him to say bad about you, thinking you gave him bad gadget.I am really disappointed.  Before buying, I read all the reviews about this camera,  hoping review's will help me decide. I saw 1-2 or suggesting the same.  But ignore them.Using this camera, you can not take normal (normal) photo in standard lighted room.  You may read and try all photo technique,  but in end you an expert.  And then you will hate this camera more as you are now more expert.Pros:- May be Optical Zoom, if properly used on good sunny day.  It is difficult to get a shot at maximum zoom.Cons:- Night time photos, forget it.  Really out of 5 photos maybe 1 or 2 will be ok with FLASH.  Others will be not sharp, mostly shacky or maybe not properly lighted.  The end result,  this camera is not reliable.- Using given control,  Try taking photos of 3-4 kids(not playing) in lighted room.  I am sure you can not even take 2-3 good photos out of 10-15 photoes,  which you may want to print.Seriously thinking about Nikon products now.Amazon should start some exchagne program, to get back this kind of products back.

Reviews.Title: Not for me
Reviews.Author: RVL
Reviews.Content: I use only Nikon cameras so I thought this would work. I am used to SLR's. This camera is not any way close to a SLR, slow and not what I expected. I returned it. It may work for you.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: djmissionary "DJmissionary"
Reviews.Content: We just purchased the camera, but what I have seen thus far is fantastic.  Amazing zoom.

Reviews.Title: Nikon P100,excellent!!!
Reviews.Author: Jose Luis Galarza "jl"

Reviews.Title: nikon coolpix p100
Reviews.Author: Annette Phillips "Ladybug"
Reviews.Content: I haven't had it long enough but so far so good.  I am disappointed to find out that this camera was more expensive on line than in at Office depot, I just saw, like around $75.

Reviews.Title: Focus
Reviews.Author: William C. Milo "Bill Milo"
Reviews.Content: I like the functions listed on the Camera.  I wanted to see one and try it before I bought it.  I went to Costco and they had one to try.  I tried to focus the camera in the store and the results were not good.  I looked through the electronic view finder and until I pressed the picture take button half way down it seldom focused. I do not know if I had a faulty camera or if that was the best it would perform. So far I am no longer considering buying the camera.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Cool Pix
Reviews.Author: edgar A Poe
Reviews.Content: This is a marvelous camera. I do not think that the fact that I don't have one should really affect the validity of the following review.First off, its NEW, and that alone means that its better than last year's camera, so its got to be worth owning on that score alone.Second, based on the reviews, people seem to like it... A LOT, so once again, that is a very good indicator that its worth every penny.Now, for more personal observations: It is smaller than most SLR's built up to this point... I like that... (If there has always been a drawback to getting professional quality photos, it has been the size and weight of the cameras). This is smaller and lighter. I like it. I just know I do. Second, but no less personal: It's a Nikon. And look at how affordable it is! I have seen Nikons for thousands of dollars this is a fraction of the price! I'm sure the people at Nikon wouldn't sell something inferior even if it is affordable. Besides it isn't Thaaat affordable. I mean compared to a Fuji or something like that.So in summe, it's a great camera, I don't own one, but just the knowledge that I could is a plus! And a lot of people on this site, with a lot more experience using it than myself say it is... so I am sure it is! And if you are on the fence about this I hope this review helped you decide which way to go. In a nutshell: The best camera I have never owned.
